ygData.subject: Re: bounty hunters for hire
ygData.msgSnippet: ... warfare, held a large gun that shot out missles. He also had two jade eye ... random targets and taking the stress of the two main gunners, Marine and Hell

Received: from JP3884@... by imo-r19.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v27.9.) id a.ea.5a9b14e (4185) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Tue, 23 May 2000 12:14:55 -0400 (EDT)

Subject: Re: bounty hunters for hire
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::: Hell Beast, crouched behinde several scattered boulders with his troops 
fired his chain guns towrds Set and his minions :::

::: Marine, the large and bulky turtle bot who seemed to be a natural at 
warfare, held a large gun that shot out missles. He also had two jade eye 
beams that spit out at Ra and Zues :::

::: Jackle, Gremlin, and Transanulas just began the random assult, making 
random targets and taking the stress of the two main gunners, Marine and Hell 
Beast. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Once we get Set, I suspect his creations will make a hasty 
retreat.

::: Marine, in a gravely, gruff voice that seemed to say he had been a vetren 
in many wars, ::: I do agree Commander. We have the tactical advantage of 
outnumbering them and we know the valley much better. Besides, I do belive 
they are cowards.

::: Hell Beast decided that not only the turtle bot was a warrior, but a 
skilled wiseman. Whatever ship this bot came out of, Hell Beast was glad to 
have him on his side. It seemd as though the trtle belived he was in a 
constant war, and he did have a unique respect for rank and order. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Yes Marine. Now, we'll need to get behinde them, once we 
split them apart, we will win.

:::: Marine ::: But Commander, they used the same technique on us earlier in 
the forest. Im sure thats what they are attempting as we speak.

::: Hell Beast ::: Ah, yes. Any suggestions?

::: Marine ::: Send Black Aracnia, Pheniox, and Gremlin to flank there 
position. They will attack from behinde while we assult from the front. No 
doubt there will be casualties though...

::: Hell Beast ::: Good thinking. We will contact Zardus as well...prehaps 
half of his team can help us here, and the other half can attack the 
Newcomers ship directly.

::: Marine took out a feild communicator designed to be used in heavey combat 
:::

::: Marine ::: Commander Zardus of the Allience, this is General Marine of 
the Predacon Empire. We request your assistance. I will send out the map of 
whats going on and where you should attack. I advise you split up your men 
and send half to help us, and the other half to attack the Newcomers ship.

::: He then put it away and continued firing :::

::: Hell Beast noticed how Marine made himself General, and how he referred 
to the Predacons as the Predacon Empire. Truly he did have complete loyalty 
to the cause, and if he were born on Cybertron, he would have been a great 
transformer. Now, though, he was a fantastic general who would no doubt help 
the Predacons in there victories. :::

~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Set watched as the Turtle bot sent his message. He cursed and then tried 
to his his large green head. That warrior was single handedly crippling Set's 
campagin...he would have to get rid of Marine or convert him. :::

::: Ra ::: Master Set! Master Set! The transmission the Turtle bot just sent 
was to Zardus of the Allience! 

::: Set ::: Damn! Tell Shuko to send out a dispatch to the Alliences base. 
We'll keep them busy there.

::: Ra ::: I dont think Master Shuko has any spare warriors!

::: Set ::: He is a smart Predacon, he wil lthink of something. Now, Zues, 
can you form Dark Messhia and crush these bugs ?!!!

~~~~~~~~~

::: Megatron watched as the fuzor listened to the battle outside :::

::: Megatron ::: Dont worry. Your all fixed up now. 

::: He pointed to a seat where Quickstrike was to sit. :::

::: Megatron ::: We are only here for a short time. A coallition with Hell 
Beast. And as your commander, Im ordering you to accompany me to the 
Newcomers vessle. We will set up a small fortification there and monitor 
there communications and dispatches.

::: He turned to leave ::: Get ready, we wil ldepart soon.
